title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Skills: Accounting Principles Foundational Learning via Digital Game-Based Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Computation Skills and Understanding of Financial Terminology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Ability to explain the fundamental principles of the double-entry accounting system (debit/credit, chart of accounts) with over 85% accuracy.
Analyze and reconstruct the structure and interrelationships of financial statements (income statement, balance sheet) through simulation games.
Correctly journalize 10 types of financial transactions in a virtual company within the game and cultivate error-correction skills.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
